



```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(gapminder)
flights
```
Graficar el n√∫mero de vuelos 

```{r}
daily <- flights %>%
  group_by(dest,day) %>%
  summarize(count = n())
daily
```
```{r}
ggplot(daily, aes(x = day, y = log(count,2), color = dest, shape=dest)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_shape_manual(values = rep(0:5, 20)) + 
  labs(title = "Flights", y = "number of flights")
  #coord_cartesian(ylim=c(1, 512))
#+ coord_trans(y = 'log2') 
#+ annotate("text", x = c(45,55), y = c(2,2), label = c("here1", "here2"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(daily, aes(x = day, y = log(count,2), color = dest)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "Flights", y = "number of flights")
```

```{r}

ggplot(daily, aes(x = day, y = log(count,2), color = dest, shape=dest)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() + 
  scale_shape_manual(values = rep(0:5, 20)) + 
  labs(title = "Flights", y = "number of flights")

#annotate("text", x = c(45,55), y = c(2,2), label = c("here1", "here2"))
```
